Mar last year, US home prices grew at annual rate of 20.8%. Since that record peak, y/y growth has decelerated every month; Jan appreciated 3.8%. At this rate, it is only a matter of time before growth goes -VE, which has not happened since Apr '12. #housing #economy $ITB $XHB
